sourcesContent:
import { AfterViewInit, Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { Employee } from './models/employee.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit, AfterViewInit { title = 'Employee'; employeeForm: FormGroup; employees : Employee[] | undefined; employeesToDisplay : Employee[] // firstname : any // lastname : any educationOptions = [ '10th pass', 'diploma', 'garduation', 'post graduation', 'Phd' ] constructor(private fb: FormBuilder) { this.employeeForm = fb.group({}) } // initVal() { // this.firstname = "" // this.lastname ="" // } ngOnInit(): void { // this.initVal() this.employeeForm = this.fb.group({ firstname: this.fb.control('asa'), lastname: this.fb.control(''), birthday: this.fb.control(''), gender: this.fb.control(''), education: this.fb.control('default'), cpmpany: this.fb.control(''), jobExperience: this.fb.control(''), salary: this.fb.control('') }); } ngAfterViewInit(): void { // this.buttontemp.nativeElement.click() } }
